name: Heave Ho
summary: Heave Ho tasks up to four players with a simple goal – don’t fall to your death! Players will use their own two hands and the outstretched grip of their friends to grapple across each level on their way to victory.
info:
• 发行: Devolver Digital
  • 别名: HEAVE HO!
  • 别名: 嘿哟走你
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Party / Minigame
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人合作
  • 发行日期: 2019年8月29日
  • 开发: Le Cartel Studio
